|chip1 = FTDI;FT2232H;1240-C, D6LH9.1, T2232H; |chip2 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip3 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip4 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; -->

|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- Newegg number --> |asin = B009UED630 |asin_country = US |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |manuf_country = <!-- Country device was manufactured in -->
|powledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |connactled = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |spdledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |leddupcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimmin = <!-- Size of device --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device -->
}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== This is a low-cost high-speed JTAG adapter, based on FT2232H IC. Can be used to debug different architectures supported by [http://openocd.sf.net OpenOCD], program CPLDs and FPGAs; flashing directly connected SPI memory is possible with [http://flashrom.org flashrom].
==Pictures== <center>'''Retail Images''' <gallery mode="slideshow"> File:Olimex_ARM-USB-TINY-H-back.jpg File:Olimex_ARM-USB-TINY-H-front.jpg </gallery></center>[[Has images::retail| ]][[Has images::external| ]]
